unnormalised: Bro, this new VS Code extension is lit! Makes debugging Node.js apps a breeze. Earlier, I was stuck for like 2 hrs trying to figure out why my API wasn't hitting the server on port 3000. Now, with this extension, I can just set breakpoints and step through the code. Plus, the auto-complete feature for React components is saving me so much time. Seriously, if you're still using Sublime Text in 2024, you're missing out! Upgrade now. Trust me.
normalised: Bro, this new V-S Code extension is lit! Makes debugging N-ode.j-s apps a breeze. Earlier, I was stuck for like two hours trying to figure out why my A-P-I wasn't hitting the server on port three thousand. Now, with this extension, I can just set breakpoints and step through the code. Plus, the auto-complete feature for R-eact components is saving me so much time. Seriously, if you're still using Sublime Text in two thousand and twenty four, you're missing out! Upgrade now. Trust me.
